external_games.name: Dream Life in the Country Side

name: Dream Life in the Country Side
storyline: Lisa loves the laid-back life in countryside villages so much that she even took agriculture classes in college. When she heard that there's a new program to repopulate a village that will provide those who come with some land, she immediately jumped at the opportunity. Her friend Honoka even decided to join her to keep her company! Join them as they plant crops, raise animals, interact with the villagers, and grow their little slice of village life into something to be proud of.
summary: A laid-back farming simulator where you play as Lisa, a dedicated farmer by day and a passionate partner of Honoka at night. Work the land, raise animals, and cultivate your relationship. Unlock special scenes as your bond and farm flourish.
